China: Johann Adam Schall von Bell wrote the first Chinese language treatise on the telescope. The Jesuit Nicolas Trigault invented the first system for the romanization of Chinese. Battle of Ningyuan: A Ming force defended Xingcheng against a numerically superior later Jin army. Nurhaci suffered fatal wounds.
Philippine: Juan Niño de Tabora appointed Governor-General (1626–1632).
